There is now a career mode so,

Right now, KSP is in Sandbox Complete

should be removed. And also, a better description of what you can do should be given, in order to attract more users. I try to tell my friends about this game but it's so much I can do in this game, it's hard to explain it simply. And it's so fun and realistic, but they just think it's boring or just think it's a stupid kid game because of the kerbals.

I want them to actually try it though.

In my experience showing them Youtube videos (Manly & Co.) is the best way to win them over. As for the "kids game" thing due to Kerbals, that tends to quickly change from "kids game" to "omg, I killed Jeb again" pretty quickly once they start playing
